meta.description: Optimize production to minimize compensation and storage costs for contract bookings of products I, II, and III over four quarters.

params.name: demand
params.description: Contract booking numbers for each product and quarter

params.name: production_time_per_unit
params.description: Production time required per unit for each product

params.name: production_time_available
params.description: Total production time available per quarter

params.name: compensation_cost
params.description: Compensation cost per unit per quarter for late delivery

params.name: storage_cost
params.description: Storage cost per unit per quarter

vars.name: production
vars.description: Units of product produced in each quarter

vars.name: inventory
vars.description: Inventory of product at the end of each quarter

vars.name: compensation
vars.description: Units of product not delivered on time

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(compensation_cost[p] * compensation[p][q] + storage_cost * inventory[p][q] for p in PRODUCTS for q in QUARTERS)
objective.description: Minimize total compensation and storage costs

constraints.name: production_time_Q1
constraints.expr_lhs: production['I']['1'] * production_time_per_unit['I'] + production['II']['1'] * production_time_per_unit['II'] + production['III']['1'] * production_time_per_unit['III']

constraints.name: production_time_Q2
constraints.description: Production time constraint for quarter 2 (Product I cannot be produced)

constraints.name: production_time_Q3
constraints.expr_lhs: production['I']['3'] * production_time_per_unit['I'] + production['II']['3'] * production_time_per_unit['II'] + production['III']['3'] * production_time_per_unit['III']

constraints.name: production_time_Q4
constraints.expr_lhs: production['I']['4'] * production_time_per_unit['I'] + production['II']['4'] * production_time_per_unit['II'] + production['III']['4'] * production_time_per_unit['III']

constraints.name: inventory_balance_I_Q1
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product I in quarter 1

constraints.name: inventory_balance_I_Q2
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product I in quarter 2

constraints.name: inventory_balance_I_Q3
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product I in quarter 3

constraints.name: inventory_balance_I_Q4
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product I in quarter 4

constraints.name: inventory_balance_II_Q1
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product II in quarter 1

constraints.name: inventory_balance_II_Q2
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product II in quarter 2

constraints.name: inventory_balance_II_Q3
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product II in quarter 3

constraints.name: inventory_balance_II_Q4
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product II in quarter 4

constraints.name: inventory_balance_III_Q1
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product III in quarter 1

constraints.name: inventory_balance_III_Q2
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product III in quarter 2

constraints.name: inventory_balance_III_Q3
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product III in quarter 3

constraints.name: inventory_balance_III_Q4
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product III in quarter 4

constraints.name: end_inventory_I
constraints.description: End inventory requirement for product I

constraints.name: end_inventory_II
constraints.description: End inventory requirement for product II

constraints.name: end_inventory_III
constraints.description: End inventory requirement for product III
